result.execSummary:
The defendant Candice M. Townsend was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Conceal (<=$500) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine and DNA surcharge are to be paid at $25 per month and the 1st of each month thereafter until paid in full or serve 5 days jail as penalty for failure to pay.
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

records.addlTxt:
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.  
Pretrial Incarceration Credit form filed.

Kevin M. Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Candice M. Townsend in court with attorney Amelia L Bizzaro.  
Jury Trial Canceled.


Defendant enters a plea of Guilty to the charge.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of the charge.

Court orders the following:
Court Grants 2 Days Credit.
Fine:  $294.50
DNA Sample and Surcharge:  $200
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
To be paid at the rate of $25 per month, starting 11/01/15 and the 1st of every month till paid in full.
Alternate:  5  Days in the Waukesha County Jail.
Jury status hearing on September 17, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial - 12 person on September 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Ted S. Szczupakiewicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Amelia L Bizzaro in court.   
Defendant Candice M. Townsend did not appear.
Defendant is Federal Custody in Dodge County Jail - She was revoked on this charge.
Defendant should be released from Federal Custody the end of August.

Matter will be set for Trial.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for September 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury status hearing scheduled for September 17, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Candice M. Townsend in court with attorney Amelia L Bizzaro.  
Attorney Bizzaro just retained and waiting on discovery.
File not called on the record.
  Hearing scheduled for June 4, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Defendant to have no contact with co defendant victim/witness/business listed in the Criminal Complaint.  Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.

ADDRESS INFO for Candice M. Townsend

Prior: 3028 N 36th St, Milwaukee, WI 53210
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.

Defendant Candice M. Townsend in court, in custody, with attorney Samuel W. Benedict.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.  Defendant is eligible for State Public Defender representation.  An attorney will be appointed.
  Hearing scheduled for May 4, 2015 at 09:00 am.
